title: Capstone in reverse mode
content:
I am using capstone in python in order to dissassemble binary instructions.

Is there a way to work in the reverse mode ? I mean typing some asm instructions and ask capstone (in python) to generate binary (I mean raw binary, whithout ELF or PE)

comments.text: You need keystone-engine.org .
You should better use tools such as rasm2 than Keystone. Except if you want to code something fully automatized (then, Keystone is the one to use).
